name: Para: Rime of Zealot
description:
Believe in it, and anything can be the truth.

When Lovan opened his eyes again, the ship was in utter chaos.
Many crew members died for unknown reasons, leaving only six survivors on the ship.
The specter of the deceased crew members spread fear.
While Lovan was still trying to make sense of the situation, the 'Messiah' appeared.
He wants you to find the murderer hidden among the surviving crew members and kill him.

So Lovan, with a mixture of doubt and determination, began his mission to save everyone...
He will face yet more choices...

Game Features
Players will explore the ship from the perspective of Rowan.

Search for a water source before dehydration sets in.

Uncover the truth about the deaths of other sailors on the stylistically intense ship.

This game contains elements such as blood and violence and is not suitable for those who may find these elements disturbing.
Also contains elements of depression, suicide, etc., please consider carefully before playing if sensitive.
